name: Megaman
0:
”Alexa, set the lamp to warm white”
”Alexa, turn on the lamp”
”Alexa, set the lamp to ten percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: When you have downloaded the Megaman App you can pair it with Alexa to control the Megaman App through voice control. Through Alexa you can give commands to the App so you can control the light, light moods, rooms and routines.
